short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alerts you when you've been scrolling your feed for too long.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Owing to the massive amounts of information present in our social media feeds, we end up wasting a lot of time scrolling through random information. This extension alerts users when they've scrolled past a certain limit. The users can then close the alert and choose to continue scrolling, or take this as a sign it's time to stop scrolling and do something more productive.

Currently this only works on the few websites specified in the manifest:
Quora, Facebook, Twitter, and Reddit.
